entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 1:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
